comedy.overview: Nancy Stokes doesn't know good sex. Whatever it may be, Nancy, a retired schoolteacher, is pretty sure she has never had it, but she is determined to finally do something about that. She even has a plan: It involves an anonymous hotel room, and a young sex worker who calls himself Leo Grande.
comedy.title: Good Luck to You, Leo Grande

comedy.overview: A celebrated author takes a journey with some old friends to have some fun and heal old wounds. Her nephew comes along to wrangle the ladies and finds himself involved with a young literary agent.
comedy.title: Let Them All Talk

comedy.overview: Food critic Steve Coogan and traveling companion Rob Brydon trade delicious barbs and clever remarks as they tour various eateries in northern England.
comedy.title: The Trip

comedy.overview: Three friends come together to defend their valuable mining company from…aliens?! What could possibly go wrong?
comedy.title: Office Invasion

comedy.overview: A young man is stood up at the altar. His overprotective mother decides to join him is what would have been his honeymoon, so as not to waste the trip. He ails while his mum enjoys the trip of her life.
comedy.title: Honeymoon With My Mother

comedy.overview: Vivian, a seemingly shy 16-year-old, has always preferred to keep her head down and fly under the radar. But when the arrival of a new student forces her to examine the unchecked behavior of her fellow students running rampant at her high school, Vivian realizes she's fed up. Inspired by her mother's rebellious past, Vivian anonymously publishes an underground zine called Moxie to expose bias and wrongdoing in her high school, and unexpectedly sparks a movement.
comedy.title: Moxie
comedy.producer: Kim Lessing, Amy Poehler, Morgan Sackett

comedy.overview: Nancy Stokes doesn't know good sex. Whatever it may be, Nancy, a retired schoolteacher, is pretty sure she has never had it, but she is determined to finally do something about that. She even has a plan: It involves an anonymous hotel room, and a young sex worker who calls himself Leo Grande.
comedy.title: Good Luck to You, Leo Grande

comedy.overview: A celebrated author takes a journey with some old friends to have some fun and heal old wounds. Her nephew comes along to wrangle the ladies and finds himself involved with a young literary agent.
comedy.title: Let Them All Talk

comedy.overview: Food critic Steve Coogan and traveling companion Rob Brydon trade delicious barbs and clever remarks as they tour various eateries in northern England.
comedy.title: The Trip

comedy.overview: Three friends come together to defend their valuable mining company from…aliens?! What could possibly go wrong?
comedy.title: Office Invasion

Inspired by her mother's rebellious past, Vivian anonymously publishes an underground zine called Moxie to expose bias and wrongdoing in her high school, and unexpectedly sparks a movement.
comedy.title: Moxie
comedy.producer: Kim Lessing, Amy Poehler, Morgan Sackett

comedy.overview: A young man is stood up at the altar. His overprotective mother decides to join him is what would have been his honeymoon, so as not to waste the trip. He ails while his mum enjoys the trip of her life.
comedy.title: Honeymoon With My Mother

romance.overview: A story of a second chance, the reawakening of love between Anne Elliot and Captain Frederick Wentworth, whom eight years earlier she had been persuaded not to marry. Wentworth returns from the Napoleonic Wars with prize money and the social acceptability of naval rank.
romance.title: Persuasion

romance.overview: A small town girl is caught between dead-end jobs. A high-profile, successful man becomes wheelchair bound following an accident. The man decides his life is not worth living until the girl is hired for six months to be his new caretaker. Worlds apart and trapped together by circumstance, the two get off to a rocky start. But the girl becomes determined to prove to the man that life is worth living and as they embark on a series of adventures together, each finds their world changing in ways neither of them could begin to imagine.
romance.title: Me Before You

romance.overview: A small town girl is caught between dead-end jobs. A high-profile, successful man becomes wheelchair bound following an accident. The man decides his life is not worth living until the girl is hired for six months to be his new caretaker. Worlds apart and trapped together by circumstance, the two get off to a rocky start. But the girl becomes determined to prove to the man that life is worth living and as they embark on a series of adventures together, each finds their world changing in ways neither of them could begin to imagine.
romance.title: Redeeming Love
romance.producer: Cindy Bond, Brittany Yost, Simon Swart, Wayne Fitzjohn, Michael Scott, David A.R. White

romance.overview: A young man's difficult entry into adulthood, who experiences the highs and lows of his first love, while dealing with the familial fallout spurred by the financial crisis of 2008.
romance.title: First Love
romance.producer: Nadine de Barros, A.J. Edwards, Lucas Jarach, Henry Kittredge, Henry Briggs Kittredge

romance.overview: A U.S. soccer star suffers a career-threatening injury in the run-up to the World Cup, and during his recovery, embarks on an epic romance with a Russian single mom.
romance.title: See You Soon

romance.overview: A poor yet passionate young man (Ryan Gosling) falls in love with a rich young woman (Rachel McAdams), giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated because of their social differences.
romance.title: The Notebook

romance.overview: Laura and Massimo's relationship hangs in the balance as they try to overcome trust issues while a tenacious Nacho works to push them apart.
romance.title: The Next 365 Days
romance.producer: Maciej Kawulski, Ewa Lewandowska, Tomasz Mandes

romance.overview: A story of a second chance, the reawakening of love between Anne Elliot and Captain Frederick Wentworth, whom eight years earlier she had been persuaded not to marry. Wentworth returns from the Napoleonic Wars with prize money and the social acceptability of naval rank.
romance.title: Persuasion

romance.title: Me Before You

romance.overview: A young man's difficult entry into adulthood, who experiences the highs and lows of his first love, while dealing with the familial fallout spurred by the financial crisis of 2008.
romance.title: First Love
romance.producer: Nadine de Barros, A.J. Edwards, Lucas Jarach, Henry Kittredge, Henry Briggs Kittredge

romance.overview: A U.S. soccer star suffers a career-threatening injury in the run-up to the World Cup, and during his recovery, embarks on an epic romance with a Russian single mom.
romance.title: See You Soon

romance.overview: A poor yet passionate young man (Ryan Gosling) falls in love with a rich young woman (Rachel McAdams), giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated because of their social differences.
romance.title: The Notebook

romance.overview: Laura and Massimo's relationship hangs in the balance as they try to overcome trust issues while a tenacious Nacho works to push them apart.
romance.title: The Next 365 Days
romance.producer: Maciej Kawulski, Ewa Lewandowska, Tomasz Mandes

drama.overview: A rock climbing adventure between two friends turns into a terrifying nightmare. After Kelly captures the murder of her best friend on camera, she becomes the next target of a tight-knit group of friends who will stop at nothing to destroy the evidence and anyone in their way. Desperate for her safety, she begins a treacherous climb up a mountain cliff and her survival instincts are put to the test when she becomes trapped with the killers just 20 feet away.
drama.title: The Ledge
drama.producer: Milos Djukelic, Fred Hedman, Kate Hoffman

drama.overview: When Christy discovers her 10-year-old daughter Anna has a rare, incurable disease, she becomes a ferocious advocate for her daughter’s healing as she searches for a solution. After Anna has a freak accident and falls three stories, a miracle unfolds in the wake of her dramatic rescue that leaves medical specialists mystified, her family restored and their community inspired.
drama.title: Miracles from Heaven
drama.producer: Joe Roth, Thomas Dexter Jakes Sr., DeVon Franklin

drama.overview: A true story of the tremendous global effort to rescue a Thai soccer team who become trapped in the Tham Luang cave during an unexpected rainstorm. Faced with insurmountable odds, a team of the world's most skilled and experienced divers -- uniquely able to navigate the maze of flooded, narrow cave tunnels -- join with Thai forces and more than 10,000 volunteers to attempt a harrowing rescue of the twelve boys and their coach. With impossibly high stakes and the entire world watching, the group embarks on their most challenging dive yet, showcasing the limitlessness of the human spirit in the process.
drama.title: Thirteen Lives
drama.producer: Brian Grazer, Ron Howard, Karen Lunder, P.J. van Sandwijk, Gabrielle Tana, William M. Connor

drama.overview: When single father Max (John Cho) discovers he has a terminal disease, he decides to try and cram all the years of love and support he will miss with his teenage daughter Wally (Mia Isaac) into the time he has left with her. With the promise of long-awaited driving lessons, he convinces Wally to accompany him on a road trip from California to New Orleans for his 20th college reunion, where he secretly hopes to reunite her with her mother who left them long ago. A wholly original and emotional journey, Don't Make Me Go explores the unbreakable, eternal bond between a father and daughter from both sides of the generational divide with heart and humor along for the ride.
drama.title: Don't make me go
drama.producer: Donald De Line, Leah Holzer, Peter Saraf

drama.overview: The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All American football player and first round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.
drama.title: The Blind Side
drama.producer: Gil Netter, Broderick Johnson, Andrew A. Kosove

drama.overview: The powerful true story of Harvard-educated lawyer Bryan Stevenson, who goes to Alabama to defend the disenfranchised and wrongly condemned — including Walter McMillian, a man sentenced to death despite evidence proving his innocence. Bryan fights tirelessly for Walter with the system stacked against them.
drama.title: Just Mercy
drama.producer: Gil Netter, Asher Goldstein, Michael B. Jordan

drama.overview: A rock climbing adventure between two friends turns into a terrifying nightmare. After Kelly captures the murder of her best friend on camera, she becomes the next target of a tight-knit group of friends who will stop at nothing to destroy the evidence and anyone in their way. Desperate for her safety, she begins a treacherous climb up a mountain cliff and her survival instincts are put to the test when she becomes trapped with the killers just 20 feet away.

drama.title: The Blind Side
drama.producer: Gil Netter, Broderick Johnson, Andrew A. Kosove

drama.overview: The powerful true story of Harvard-educated lawyer Bryan Stevenson, who goes to Alabama to defend the disenfranchised and wrongly condemned — including Walter McMillian, a man sentenced to death despite evidence proving his innocence. Bryan fights tirelessly for Walter with the system stacked against them.
drama.title: Just Mercy
drama.producer: Gil Netter, Asher Goldstein, Michael B. Jordan

thriller.overview: When the CIA's top asset -- his identity known to no one -- uncovers agency secrets, he triggers a global hunt by assassins set loose by his ex-colleague.
thriller.title: The Gray Man
thriller.producer: Joe Roth, Jeff Kirschenbaum, Joe Russo, Anthony Russo, Mike Larocca, Chris Castaldi

thriller.overview: Trapped in a mysterious psychiatric ward, a man with no memory comes to believe that he’s the President of the United States and the subject of a diabolical political conspiracy. As the asylum’s soul-crushing forces bear down on him, he fights to preserve his sanity and escape so that he can return to power.
thriller.title: The current occpuant

thriller.overview: The powerful true story of Harvard-educated lawyer Bryan Stevenson, who goes to Alabama to defend the disenfranchised and wrongly condemned — including Walter McMillian, a man sentenced to death despite evidence proving his innocence. Bryan fights tirelessly for Walter with the system stacked against them.
thriller.title: Don't Let Go
thriller.producer: Jason Blum, Bobby Cohen, David Oyelowo

thriller.overview: The teenage girls of Vestalis Academy are meticulously trained in the art of being “clean girls,” practicing the virtues of perfect femininity. But what exactly are they being trained for? Vivien intends to find out.
thriller.title: Level 16

thriller.overview: Chris and his girlfriend Rose go upstate to visit her parents for the weekend. At first, Chris reads the family's overly accommodating behavior as nervous attempts to deal with their daughter's interracial relationship, but as the weekend progresses, a series of increasingly disturbing discoveries lead him to a truth that he never could have imagined.
thriller.title: Get Out
thriller.producer: Sean McKittrick, Jason Blum, Ted Hamm, Jordan Peele

thriller.overview: Girls in a prison-like boarding school embark on a desperate search to uncover the awful truth behind their captivity.
thriller.title: Legend Quest: The Origin
thriller.producer: Fernando de Fuentes, Jose C. Garcia de Letona

thriller.overview: Finney Blake, a shy but clever 13-year-old boy, is abducted by a sadistic killer and trapped in a soundproof basement where screaming is of little use. When a disconnected phone on the wall begins to ring, Finney discovers that he can hear the voices of the killer’s previous victims. And they are dead set on making sure that what happened to them doesn’t happen to Finney.
thriller.title: The Black Phone
thriller.producer: Jason Blum, Scott Derrickson, C. Robert Cargill

thriller.overview: Esther's terrifying saga continues in this thrilling prequel to the original and shocking horror hit 'Orphan'. After orchestrating a brilliant escape from an Estonian psychiatric facility, Esther travels to America by impersonating the missing daughter of a wealthy family. Yet, an unexpected twist arises that pits her against a mother who will protect her family from the murderous 'child' at any cost.
thriller.title: Orphan: First Kill
thriller.producer: Ethan Erwin, Alex Mace, Hal Sadoff, James Tomlinson

thriller.overview: A teenager finds her perfect life upended when she's stalked by a mysterious doppelganger who has her eyes set on assuming her identity.
thriller.title: Another Me
thriller.producer: Mariela Besuievsky, Nicole Carmen-Davis, Marta Esteban, Rebekah Gilbertson

thriller.overview: When the CIA's top asset -- his identity known to no one -- uncovers agency secrets, he triggers a global hunt by assassins set loose by his ex-colleague.
thriller.title: The Gray Man
thriller.producer: Joe Roth, Jeff Kirschenbaum, Joe Russo, Anthony Russo, Mike Larocca, Chris Castaldi

thriller.title: Legend Quest: The Origin

thriller.producer: Jason Blum, Scott Derrickson, C. Robert Cargill

thriller.overview: Esther's terrifying saga continues in this thrilling prequel to the original and shocking horror hit 'Orphan'. thriller.title: Orphan: First Kill
thriller.producer: Ethan Erwin, Alex Mace, Hal Sadoff, James Tomlinson

thriller.overview: A teenager finds her perfect life upended when she's stalked by a mysterious doppelganger who has her eyes set on assuming her identity.
thriller.title: Another Me
thriller.producer: Mariela Besuievsky, Nicole Carmen-Davis, Marta Esteban, Rebekah Gilbertson

action.overview: Hutch Mansell, a suburban dad, overlooked husband, nothing neighbor — a 'nobody'. When two thieves break into his home one night, Hutch's unknown long-simmering rage is ignited and propels him on a brutal path that will uncover dark secrets he fought to leave behind.
action.title: Nobody
action.producer: Kelly McCormick, David Leitch, Braden Aftergood, Bob Odenkirk, Marc Provissiero

action.overview: The Red Ribbon Army, an evil organization that was once destroyed by Goku in the past, has been reformed by a group of people who have created new and mightier Androids, Gamma 1 and Gamma 2, and seek vengeance against Goku and his family.
action.title: Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero

action.overview: A fictional history of two legendary revolutionaries' journey away from home before they began fighting for their country in the 1920s.
action.title: RRR

action.overview: When danger threatens her camp, the fierce and highly skilled Comanche warrior Naru sets out to protect her people. But the prey she stalks turns out to be a highly evolved alien predator with a technically advanced arsenal.
action.title: Prey
action.producer: John Davis, John Fox, Jhane Myers

action.overview: After his retirement is interrupted by Gorr the God Butcher, a galactic killer who seeks the extinction of the gods, Thor Odinson enlists the help of King Valkyrie, Korg, and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster, who now inexplicably wields Mjolnir as the Relatively Mighty Girl Thor. Together they embark upon a harrowing cosmic adventure to uncover the mystery of the God Butcher’s vengeance and stop him before it’s too late.
action.title: Thor: Love and Thunder

action.overview: Four years after Isla Nublar was destroyed, dinosaurs now live—and hunt—alongside humans all over the world. This fragile balance will reshape the future and determine, once and for all, whether human beings are to remain the apex predators on a planet they now share with history’s most fearsome creatures.
action.title: Jurassic World Dominion

action.overview: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy’s top aviators, and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him, Pete “Maverick” Mitchell finds himself training a detachment of TOP GUN graduates for a specialized mission the likes of which no living pilot has ever seen.
action.title: Top Gun: Maverick
action.producer: Jerry Bruckheimer, Tom Cruise, Christopher McQuarrie, David Ellison

action.overview: Doctor Strange, with the help of mystical allies both old and new, traverses the mind-bending and dangerous alternate realities of the Multiverse to confront a mysterious new adversary.
action.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness

action.overview: Hutch Mansell, a suburban dad, overlooked husband, nothing neighbor — a 'nobody'. When two thieves break into his home one night, Hutch's unknown long-simmering rage is ignited and propels him on a brutal path that will uncover dark secrets he fought to leave behind.
action.title: Nobody
action.producer: Kelly McCormick, David Leitch, Braden Aftergood, Bob Odenkirk, Marc Provissiero

756999.overview: Finney Blake, a shy but clever 13-year-old boy, is abducted by a sadistic killer and trapped in a soundproof basement where screaming is of little use. When a disconnected phone on the wall begins to ring, Finney discovers that he can hear the voices of the killer’s previous victims. And they are dead set on making sure that what happened to them doesn’t happen to Finney.
756999.title: The Black Phone
756999.producer: Jason Blum, Scott Derrickson, C. Robert Cargill

755566.overview: Esther's terrifying saga continues in this thrilling prequel to the original and shocking horror hit 'Orphan'. After orchestrating a brilliant escape from an Estonian psychiatric facility, Esther travels to America by impersonating the missing daughter of a wealthy family. Yet, an unexpected twist arises that pits her against a mother who will protect her family from the murderous 'child' at any cost.
755566.title: Orphan: First Kill
755566.producer: Ethan Erwin, Alex Mace, Hal Sadoff, James Tomlinson

610150.overview: The Red Ribbon Army, an evil organization that was once destroyed by Goku in the past, has been reformed by a group of people who have created new and mightier Androids, Gamma 1 and Gamma 2, and seek vengeance against Goku and his family.
610150.title: Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero

766507.overview: When danger threatens her camp, the fierce and highly skilled Comanche warrior Naru sets out to protect her people. But the prey she stalks turns out to be a highly evolved alien predator with a technically advanced arsenal.
766507.title: Prey
766507.producer: John Davis, John Fox, Jhane Myers

616037.overview: After his retirement is interrupted by Gorr the God Butcher, a galactic killer who seeks the extinction of the gods, Thor Odinson enlists the help of King Valkyrie, Korg, and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster, who now inexplicably wields Mjolnir as the Relatively Mighty Girl Thor. Together they embark upon a harrowing cosmic adventure to uncover the mystery of the God Butcher’s vengeance and stop him before it’s too late.
616037.title: Thor: Love and Thunder

507086.overview: Four years after Isla Nublar was destroyed, dinosaurs now live—and hunt—alongside humans all over the world. This fragile balance will reshape the future and determine, once and for all, whether human beings are to remain the apex predators on a planet they now share with history’s most fearsome creatures.
507086.title: Jurassic World Dominion

361743.overview: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy’s top aviators, and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him, Pete “Maverick” Mitchell finds himself training a detachment of TOP GUN graduates for a specialized mission the likes of which no living pilot has ever seen.
361743.title: Top Gun: Maverick
361743.producer: Jerry Bruckheimer, Tom Cruise, Christopher McQuarrie, David Ellison

453395.overview: Doctor Strange, with the help of mystical allies both old and new, traverses the mind-bending and dangerous alternate realities of the Multiverse to confront a mysterious new adversary.
453395.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness

252529.overview: A teenager finds her perfect life upended when she's stalked by a mysterious doppelganger who has her eyes set on assuming her identity.
252529.title: Another Me
252529.producer: Mariela Besuievsky, Nicole Carmen-Davis, Marta Esteban, Rebekah Gilbertson

296096.overview: A small town girl is caught between dead-end jobs. A high-profile, successful man becomes wheelchair bound following an accident. The man decides his life is not worth living until the girl is hired for six months to be his new caretaker. Worlds apart and trapped together by circumstance, the two get off to a rocky start. But the girl becomes determined to prove to the man that life is worth living and as they embark on a series of adventures together, each finds their world changing in ways neither of them could begin to imagine.
296096.title: Me Before You

698508.overview: A  powerful and timeless love story that takes place against the backdrop of the California Gold Rush of 1850. The story centers on Angel (Abigail Cowen), who was sold into prostitution as a child. She has survived through hatred and self-loathing, until she meets Michael Hosea (Tom Lewis) and discovers there is no brokenness that love can't heal. The story reflects the redemptive power of unconditional and sacrificial love with characters and circumstances relevant to the contemporary world.
698508.title: Redeeming Love
698508.producer: Cindy Bond, Brittany Yost, Simon Swart, Wayne Fitzjohn, Michael Scott, David A.R. White

834742.overview: A young man's difficult entry into adulthood, who experiences the highs and lows of his first love, while dealing with the familial fallout spurred by the financial crisis of 2008.
834742.title: First Love
834742.producer: Nadine de Barros, A.J. Edwards, Lucas Jarach, Henry Kittredge, Henry Briggs Kittredge

610781.overview: A U.S. soccer star suffers a career-threatening injury in the run-up to the World Cup, and during his recovery, embarks on an epic romance with a Russian single mom.
610781.title: See You Soon

758330.overview: Nancy Stokes doesn't know good sex. Whatever it may be, Nancy, a retired schoolteacher, is pretty sure she has never had it, but she is determined to finally do something about that. She even has a plan: It involves an anonymous hotel room, and a young sex worker who calls himself Leo Grande.
758330.title: Good Luck to You, Leo Grande

339984.overview: When Christy discovers her 10-year-old daughter Anna has a rare, incurable disease, she becomes a ferocious advocate for her daughter’s healing as she searches for a solution. After Anna has a freak accident and falls three stories, a miracle unfolds in the wake of her dramatic rescue that leaves medical specialists mystified, her family restored and their community inspired.
339984.title: Miracles from Heaven
339984.producer: Joe Roth, Thomas Dexter Jakes Sr., DeVon Franklin

419430.overview: Chris and his girlfriend Rose go upstate to visit her parents for the weekend. At first, Chris reads the family's overly accommodating behavior as nervous attempts to deal with their daughter's interracial relationship, but as the weekend progresses, a series of increasingly disturbing discoveries lead him to a truth that he never could have imagined.
419430.title: Get Out
419430.producer: Sean McKittrick, Jason Blum, Ted Hamm, Jordan Peele

522212.overview: The powerful true story of Harvard-educated lawyer Bryan Stevenson, who goes to Alabama to defend the disenfranchised and wrongly condemned — including Walter McMillian, a man sentenced to death despite evidence proving his innocence. Bryan fights tirelessly for Walter with the system stacked against them.
522212.title: Just Mercy
522212.producer: Gil Netter, Asher Goldstein, Michael B. Jordan

539651.overview: A detective suffering from a personal loss receives a call from his recently deceased niece. Being able to communicate across time, the two work together to try and stop the crime before it occurs.
539651.title: Don't Let Go
539651.producer: Jason Blum, Bobby Cohen, David Oyelowo

623856.overview: A celebrated author takes a journey with some old friends to have some fun and heal old wounds. Her nephew comes along to wrangle the ladies and finds himself involved with a young literary agent.
623856.title: Let Them All Talk

615457.overview: Hutch Mansell, a suburban dad, overlooked husband, nothing neighbor — a 'nobody'. When two thieves break into his home one night, Hutch's unknown long-simmering rage is ignited and propels him on a brutal path that will uncover dark secrets he fought to leave behind.
615457.title: Nobody
615457.producer: Kelly McCormick, David Leitch, Braden Aftergood, Bob Odenkirk, Marc Provissiero

579974.overview: A fictional history of two legendary revolutionaries' journey away from home before they began fighting for their country in the 1920s.
579974.title: RRR

22881.overview: The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All American football player and first round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.
22881.title: The Blind Side
22881.producer: Gil Netter, Broderick Johnson, Andrew A. Kosove

955971.overview: A young man is stood up at the altar. His overprotective mother decides to join him is what would have been his honeymoon, so as not to waste the trip. He ails while his mum enjoys the trip of her life.
955971.title: Honeymoon With My Mother
